project_title: Trick Shot Competition - Phil Mickelson vs Grant Horvat
concept: Overconfident Phil Mickelson challenges nervous Grant Horvat to a trick shot competition

production_workflow.step_1: Generate character reference images using provided prompts
production_workflow.step_2: Create scene videos using AI video generation platform
production_workflow.step_3: Generate character voices using AI voice synthesis
production_workflow.step_4: Edit scenes together with dialogue sync
production_workflow.step_5: Add background music and sound effects
production_workflow.step_6: Color grade and add golf-themed graphics

ai_platforms_needed.video_generation: Runway Gen-3, Stable Video Diffusion, or Pika Labs
ai_platforms_needed.video_editing: Final Cut Pro, Premiere Pro, or DaVinci Resolve
